title: Kelvinator Refrigerator Crisper Glass Shelf Insert
description: Kelvinator Refrigerator Crisper Glass Shelf Insert ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 56 Reviews PartSelect Number PS429963 Manufacturer Part Number 240350608 Glass only. This glass insert measures 23.82 x 15.50-in. This is an authentic Frigidaire replacement part. The crisper shelf insert is designed by the manufacturer for use in refrigerators. This part is made of glass, and is placed over the crisper pan drawers. No tools are required when replacing this item. Simply remove the old part and slot the new one into place. This item is sold individually.

installationInstructions.author: shun from madison, WI
installationInstructions.title: broken pieces, thought would have to replace refrigerator.
installationInstructions.content: Former tenants had broken glass bin cover and door shelf retainer. Online parts catalog was easy to use,  pictures accurate, correct parts received promptly, fit is perfect. Price was couple bucks less than others. Thanks for saving us the cost of a new frig.
